meta.title: Operation of Laminar Air Flow Cabinet

sections.purpose: To provide a sterile work area by supplying HEPA-filtered air in a laminar flow pattern.
sections.scope: Applicable to general aseptic manipulations in Microbiology.
procedure: Switch ON the blower and light; run for 15â€“20 minutes before work.
Wipe the worktop and interior surfaces with 70% ethanol.
Arrange sterile materials without blocking air grills.
Carry out aseptic procedures within the central work zone.
On completion, disinfect all items before removal.
Clean the work surface again and allow blower to run 10 minutes more.
Switch OFF the unit and cover if provided.
precautions: Do not use open flames inside the cabinet.
Do not store non-essential materials inside permanently.
Avoid rapid movements that disturb laminar flow.
Ensure annual HEPA filter testing and certification.
Use appropriate PPE including gloves and lab coat.
